title: 2008 Ahmedabad serial blasts case: 38 convicts sentenced to death, 11 to life imprisonment - The Indian Express
content:
1. 2008 Ahmedabad serial blasts case: 38 convicts sentenced to death, 11 to life imprisonment  The Indian Express
  2. Death Sentence To 38 Out Of 49 Convicts In 2008 Ahmedabad Blasts Case  NDTV
  3. 2008 Ahmedabad serial blasts: 38 convicts get death sentence; life imprisonment until death for 11  Times of India
  4. 2008 Ahmedabad Serial Blast Case: Special Court Pronounces Death Sentence On 38 Out Of 49 Convicts  ABP Live
  5. Indian court orders death for 38 for deadly 2008 serial bomb blasts  Reuters India
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The court has also imposed a fine of Rs 2.85 lakh on each of the 48 convicts. Usman Agarbattiwala, the only one convicted under the Arms Act and among those sentenced to death, has been additionally awarded a year of imprisonment for conviction under the Arms Act.
